thread.title: Mother who triggered Amber Alert arrested
thread.title_full: Mother who triggered Amber Alert arrested | Boston Herald

author: Jordan Graham
title: Mother who triggered Amber Alert arrested
text:
A mother is in custody after police said she fled to Boston from Pennsylvania with her 2 1/2 month old son who was seriously ill, ignoring requests to take the infant to a hospital.
Tiffany Cherry, 36, was arrested early this morning after state police issued an Amber Alert.
Cherry allegedly left Pennsylvania yesterday afternoon after she was told to get emergency medical care for her son Quavai Cherry. The boy was reportedly suffering from severe dehydration, police said.
The infant is now being treated at a Boston hospital, state police said.
